titleStmt.title: A solemne and seasonable warning to all estates and degrees of persons throughout the land for holding fast the League and Covenant with England, and avoiding every thing that may prove a snare and tentation to the breach thereof: / by the Commissioners of the Generall Assemblie.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Ker, A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: A. Ker.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
